snippet.title: Help ease airport security bottlenecks
snippet.content:
ADVICE FOR AUSTRALIAN AIR TRAVELLERS * Arrive two hours before domestic flights; three hours before international flights * Keep baggage to a minimum * Only people who are flying should pass through security checkpoints * Approach checkpoints with pockets empty, laptops out and shoes off * Keep electronic devices charged so they can be powered up if security asks * Book off-peak flights
Related Articles
* Be patient and compliant when dealing with security staff (C) AAP 2017
